T02D1930:42a-1: krishna ya m'a ri s'a dha nam /
T02D1930:42a-3: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D1930:42a-4: bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1930:42a-5: dpal ldan gshin rje gshed nag la //
T02D1930:42a-7: gdams pa la brten sgrub thabs ni //
T02D1930:42a-8: mdor bsdus byis pas rtogs phyir bri //
T02D1930:42a-9: de la sngags pa nges par 'gro ba thams cad
T02D1930:42a-10: bsgral bar 'dod pa'i blo dang ldan pas dur khrod
T02D1930:42a-11: la sogs pa'i bsam gtan gyi gnas sam /
T02D1930:42a-12: gnas la lar tsandan la sogs pas byugs la /
T02D1930:42a-13: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams /
T02D1930:42a-14: bsod nams kyi tshogs dang mi ldan pas 'khor ba las bsgral bar mi nus pas na /
T02D1930:42a-15: dang por bsod nams kyi tshogs bsag par bya ba'i phyir bde ba'i stan la 'dug ste /
T02D1930:42a-16: rang gi snying gar sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma'i steng du /
T02D1930:42a-17: ya sngon po 'od zer dang bcas pa bltas la /
T02D1930:42a-18: de'i 'od zer gyis sems can thams cad gshin rje
T02D1930:42a-19: gshed du byas nas yang 'od zer des bla ma
T02D1930:42a-20: dang sangs rgyas la sogs pa mdun du spyan drangs
T02D1930:42a-21: te / de dag la mngon par phyag byas la
T02D1930:42a-22: sa bon gyi 'od zer sngon po las byung ba'i
T02D1930:42a-23: mchod pa'i sprin sna tshogs sgeg mo la sogs pa
T02D1930:42a-24: te / dang / me tog la sogs pa'i zhen pa dang bral bas yang dag par mchod do //
T02D1930:42a-25: de nas sdig pa bshags shing bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D1930:42a-27: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D1930:42a-28: de ma thag pa'i zhing la tshad med pa bzhi bsgom mo //
T02D1930:42a-29: de nas rten mu: yis gshegs so //
T02D1930:42a-30: de nas ye shes kyi tshogs la nan tan bya ste /
T02D1930:42a-31: sna tshogs stong pa nyid du bsgom zhing /
T02D1930:42a-32: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1930:42a-34: de nas stong pa'i bdag nyid las /
T02D1930:42a-35: aam las nyi ma'i steng du /
T02D1930:42a-36: h'um las rdo rje sngon po kha gyes pa bsgom par bya'o /
T02D1930:42a-37: de las byung ba'i rdo rje'i tshogs kyis rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang /
T02D1930:42a-38: ra ba dang gur bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1930:42b-0: @42b de'i dbus su skad cig gis chos 'byung gru gsum pa dkar po'i nang du /
T02D1930:42b-2: sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba la pam yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1930:42b-3: sna tshogs padma'i steng du ram las nyi ma'i dkyil
T02D1930:42b-4: 'khor gyi steng du yam yig las rdo rje sngon
T02D1930:42b-5: po 'od zer bcas pa bsams te /
T02D1930:42b-6: de'i 'od kyis thog ma med pa nas grub pa'i gshin rje gshed gsal bar byas nas /
T02D1930:42b-8: de dag yongs su gyur pa las gshin rje gshed du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1930:42b-9: de yang sku mdog nag po g-yas dkar zhing /
T02D1930:42b-13: gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa'i phyag drug pa /
T02D1930:42b-14: ma he'i steng na g-yon brkyang bas bzhugs pa /
T02D1930:42b-15: sprul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D1930:42b-16: mi mgo rlon pa'i phreng ba 'phyang ba /
T02D1930:42b-17: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can /
T02D1930:42b-18: rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D1930:42b-19: dbu skra dang sma ra ser po gyen du langs pa /
T02D1930:42b-20: zhal mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa bsams la /
T02D1930:42b-21: de nas spyi bo dang mgrin pa dang snying ga
T02D1930:42b-22: rnams su aom a'a: h'um zhes bya ba'i yi ge
T02D1930:42b-24: de nas mig la sogs pa skye mched byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02D1930:42b-26: rna ba dag tu dzrim ngo //
T02D1930:42b-31: de nas snying ga'i 'od zer gyis bskul bas de
T02D1930:42b-32: bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa rdo rje tsa rtsi k'a
T02D1930:42b-33: la sogs pas bdud rtsi rnam pa lngas gang ba'i
T02D1930:42b-34: bum pa bzung nas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D1930:42b-35: de nas snying ga'i 'od zer lcags kyu lta bus ye shes kyi rdo rje mdun du bltas te /
T02D1930:42b-36: de la mchod pa lngas yang dag par mchod la /
T02D1930:42b-37: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod pas dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang /
T02D1930:42b-38: bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba'o //
T02D1930:42b-39: de nas cho ga bzhin du mchod par bya'o //
T02D1930:42b-40: de nas bsgoms pas skyo na bzlas pa bya ste /
T02D1930:42b-41: aom hr'i: shtr'im: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1930:42b-42: ldang ba'i dus su yang mchod pa byas la /
T02D1930:42b-43: aom a'a: h'um mu: zhes bya bas ye shes kyi rdo rje gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D1930:42b-44: thun so so la ji ltar rnyed pa'i gtor ma bdud rtsi lnga'i ngo bor sbyangs la /
T02D1930:42b-45: sngags 'dis phyogs skyong rnams la dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1930:42b-46: aom aindr'a ya h'um: ya m'a ya shtri: wa ra n'a ya wi /
T02D1930:43a-8: ba su dha ra ye phat /
T02D1930:43a-9: be ma tsi tra ye sv'a /
T02D1930:43a-12: h'um h'um phem phem sv'a h'a /
T02D1930:43a-13: de nas zas za ba'i che na /
T02D1930:43a-14: bud rtsi rnam pa lngas sbyangs la /
T02D1930:43a-15: de nyid gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D1930:43a-16: lce rdo rje'i sbyor bas bza' bar bya'o //
T02D1930:43a-17: gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs 'di //
T02D1930:43a-18: byas pas dge ba gang thob pa //
T02D1930:43a-19: 'jig rten gsum ni ma lus pa //
T02D1930:43a-20: nag po'i las 'dis 'da' bar shog / gshin rje'i
T02D1930:43a-21: dgra nag po sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon gho sha
T02D1930:43a-24: // / bal po'i mkhan po su ma ti tsandra'i zhal snga nas dang /
